examples.text: it is difficult to wrest oneself away
resolves that one makes to oneself

shortDefinitions: used as object of verb or preposition when this is same as subject of clause

definitions: used to emphasize that one does something individually or unaided

examples.text: the idea of publishing a book oneself

shortDefinitions: used to emphasize that one does something individually or unaided

definitions: in one's normal and individual state of body or mind; not influenced by others
